effect.short: Raises all of the user's stats by two stages.
effect.full: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.

flavorTexts.text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets
energy from its evolved friends and boosts its
stats sharply.
